popular.name: Mattar Paneer
popular.note: Matar Paneer is an extremely popular vegetarian North Indian curry dish made of paneer(Indian cottage cheese) and Matar (green peas) in a creamy, spicy onion-tomato base gravy. It can be served with rice as well as naan or paratha or roti.

popular.name: Greek Salad
popular.note: This easy Greek salad recipe is our new favorite summer side dish! Just 7 ingredients + a simple Greek salad dressing make it refreshing & delicious.

popular.name: Fruit Salad
popular.note: Fruit salad is a dish consisting of various kinds of fruit, sometimes served in a liquid, either their own juices or a syrup. In different forms, fruit salad can be served as an appetizer, a side salad, or a dessert.

popular.name: Juice Caesar Salad
popular.note: A Caesar salad (also spelled Cesar and Cesare) is a green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice (or lime juice), olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

popular.name: Hyedrabadi Biryani
popular.note: Hyderabadi biryani, also known as Hyderabadi dum biryani, is a style of biryani from Hyderabad, India made with basmati rice and goat meat and cooked with the dum pukht method. Originating in the kitchens of the Nizam of Hyderabad, it combines elements of Hyderabadi and Mughlai cuisines.

recommended.name: Indian Cuisine Thali
recommended.note: They include curries, mixed vegetables, curd rice and sticky rice puddings. It even offers munchings such as Banana Chips, Chakli and Onion rings. Each dish on its own is a culinary specialty and this Thali is an adventure in itself!

recommended.name: Spinach Salad
recommended.note: This simple spinach salad is the perfect accompaniment to pretty much anything. We're all about sharp mustard vinaigrette paired with creamy feta and toasted almonds, but you can swap in your favorite cheese and nuts if you like!

recommended.name: Sausage Pizza
recommended.note: One such variant of everyone's much loved dish is Sausage Pizza. Sausage Pizza is a unique delicacy with a tangy mix of a variety of ingredients.

alldata.name: Dal Makhani
alldata.note: Creamy and buttery Dal Makhani is one of India's most loved dal! This dal has whole black lentils cooked with butter and cream and simmered on low heat for that unique flavor.

alldata.name: Noodels
alldata.note: Noodles are a type of food made from unleavened dough which is rolled flat and cut, stretched or extruded, into long strips or strings.

alldata.name: Italian Cuisine Pasta
alldata.note: Fresh pasta is usually locally made with fresh ingredients unless it is destined to be shipped, in which case consideration is given to the spoilage rates of the desired ingredients such as eggs or herbs.

alldata.name: Rajma Gravy Vegetarian
alldata.note: This Rajma recipe is a creamy, tangy and spiced curry made with dried kidney beans. This restaurant style Rajma Masala is made in a base of saut√©ed onions, tomatoes, spices and cream making it truly delicious.

alldata.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
alldata.note: This restaurant style Paneer Tikka Masala recipe is brimming with bright flavors from the spiced tomato onion curry sauce and delightfully marinated grilled cottage cheese. While this dish may be considered a labor of love, the time and effort are well worth it!

alldata.name: Margherita Pizza
alldata.note: Margherita Pizza is made with tomato sauce or marinara as the base sauce on the crust.

alldata.name: Masala Dosa
alldata.note: Masala Dosa is a thin crisp dosa, consumed with a spicy potato sabji. Masala Dosa is made from rice, potato, methi, curry leaves and served with Chutneys and Sambar.

alldata.note: Matar Paneer is an extremely popular vegetarian North Indian curry dish made of paneer(Indian cottage cheese) and Matar (green peas) in a creamy, spicy onion-tomato base gravy. It can be served with rice as well as naan or paratha or roti.
